acceptance.details: 2×15m closes above IBH by ~11:45 ET and one 30m hold

NQ.bias: Two-Sided, mild bullish recovery if acceptance reappears

ES.read: Rotational; failed to confirm NQ up-acceptance

YM.read: Heavier tone; did not validate NQ’s up-acceptance

confidence.notes: Earlier RE up achieved acceptance, but pm return to value, stable dPOC, no OTF, and peers failing to confirm reduce conviction.

plan_a.context: Earlier RE up achieved acceptance, but pm return to balance. Require renewed acceptance to rejoin.
triggers: Two 15m closes above IBH + TPO build
plan_a.entry: Buy pullback to IBH that holds on 15m
plan_a.invalidation: 30m close back inside IB; prominent POC overhead
plan_a.sizing: Normal only if ES stops rejecting and YM stops dragging; otherwise half
plan_a.conviction: Moderate if renewed acceptance, reduced by peer non-confirmation

plan_b.context: If probes of VAH/IBH fail without acceptance and peers are weak.
plan_b.entry: Short 15m close back inside after failed probe
plan_b.invalidation: Two 15m closes outside with build and one 30m hold
plan_b.sizing: Small–moderate; reduce if prominent POC forms

supporting_evidence: NQ gap down, early RE up achieved acceptance, now back in VA
ES gap down, RE up but no acceptance
YM gap down, RE up but no acceptance
Peers not aligned; no OTF; dPOC stable
Confidence adjusted per v9.4.4 peer rules
